I had one reaction which may be worth passing along to you. The election

the statement of tenure regarding Board members in the various districts.
It might be worthwhile to ask Burton, as secretary, to review the status
of our present members of the Board and enclose a note in the next
Newsletter stating which are in for two years at the present time and
which w0br'rs come up for re-election the next time.

or three days a letter to all regional directors urging them to start a
campaign for new members. , I am keeping a check on new applications and
